import { useRef } from "react" import "./createApp.css" import axios from "axios" import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext" import { useContext } from "react" export default function CreateApp() { const {user} = useContext(AuthContext) const submitHandler = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const address = user._id; const desc = e.target.desc.value; const name = e.target.name.value; const owner = e.target.owner.value; const app = e.target.address.value; // const together = owner-name var test = owner var test01 = name var test02 = `${test}-${test01}` const newApp = { userId: address, desc: desc, name: app, owner: owner, ip: name } await axios.post("api/apps", newApp) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }) } return (
) }
